MERIT Act of 2025
Modern Employment Reform, Improvement, and Transformation Act of 2025
A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for an alternative removal for performance or misconduct for Federal employees.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
